docs.lead_paragraph: "A healthy condition of all the functions of the body depends largely upon the care given in early life," said Mrs. Etta Morse Hudders in beginning her lecture upon the care of the "Eyes, Teeth, and Hair" before the members of the Brooklyn Institute last week.

headline.main: THE EYES, TEETH, AND HAIR; Mrs. Hudders Gives Directions for Keeping Them in a Healthy Condition. CARE IN INFANCY NECESSARY. The Foci of the Eyes Should Be Changed Frequently -- Fine Print Should Not Be Read -- Tears Are Beneficial -- Teeth and Hair Must Be Clean.

docs.snippet: "A healthy condition of all the functions of the body depends largely upon the care given in early life," said Mrs. Etta Morse Hudders in beginning her lecture upon the care of the "Eyes, Teeth, and Hair" before the members of the Brooklyn Institute...
